title: How to Make Cocoa Sticks

steps.headline: Sift the flour and cocoa together.
Add sifted flour and cocoa alternately with the milk.
Add the crushed nuts if you are using them.
Pour mixture into a large, pre-oiled or lined cookie sheet.
Bake for 20 - 30 minutes in a moderate oven.
Allow to cool on a rack.
Serve.
steps.description: Have it with a hot cup of cocoa for a treat.

text: Cream butter and sugar together.  Add eggs and beat in.  Sift the flour and cocoa together.  Add sifted flour and cocoa alternately with the milk.  Add the crushed nuts if you are using them.  Pour mixture into a large, pre-oiled or lined cookie sheet.  Bake for 20 - 30 minutes in a moderate oven.  Allow to cool on a rack.  Cut into sticks once cooled.  Serve. Have it with a hot cup of cocoa for a treat.
